text: This is a list of cities in Vietnam. ==Centrally-controlled municipalities== There are five centrally-controlled municipalities in Vietnam. City name Area (km2) Population City status Cần Thơ 1,389.60 1,187,089 1st-class Đà Nẵng 1,255.53 887,069 1st-class Hải Phòng 1,507.57 1,837,302 1st-class (is currently considered to become special class) Hà Nội 3,324.92 6,448,837 special class Hồ Chí Minh City 2,095.00 7,162,864 special class ==Provincial municipalities== Here is a list of provincial municipalities (thành phố trực thuộc tỉnh) in Vietnam.
